data.eml:eml: Description of a new species of Microhyla from Bali, Indonesia (Amphibia, Anura)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Matsui, Masafumi, Hamidy, Amir, Eto, Koshiro (2013): Description of a new species of Microhyla from Bali, Indonesia (Amphibia, Anura). Zootaxa 3670 (4): 579-590, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3670.4.9
